identity.name: CoWorkingStay
identity.subTag: Designed for those who refuse to choose between future results and today's reality.
identity.mission: We bridge the gap between professional performance and the fundamental human need to live life fully with nature, creating sanctuaries where productivity, unbound freedom and creative clarity enables you to realize your infinite horizon.
uniqueValueProposition: Coworking-first — built for productivity for high-performing people
Proper working environment — work zones for deep focus and collaboration
Privacy by design — quiet spaces, respectful boundaries, uninterrupted focus
Nature-powered performance — nature is part of the system, not a reward
targetMarket: Startup Founders / Startup Teams / Product Builders
Content Creators, Influencers, Vloggers, YouTubers, Podcasters
Couples/Friends on 'work + vacation' (hackathons, strategy planning, team building)
Students on 'study + vacation' (grad students, board reviewers, exam takers)

pillars.title: Performance
pillars.promise: Professional-grade work environments for deep focus

pillars.title: Freedom
pillars.promise: Destinations that make it effortless to reset between sessions

pillars.title: Synergy
pillars.promise: Work and life designed to amplify each other

locations.name: Work 'n Wave
locations.tagline: Work the day. Ride the wave. Live the life.
locations.address: White Beach San Isidro, Puerto Galera, Philippines
locations.description: Experience the ultimate lifestyle blend at Work 'n Wave. Located in the stunning Puerto Galera, offering the perfect blend of productivity and adventure.

locations.name: Work 'n Lake
locations.description: An exclusive lakeside retreat designed for focused work and deep collaboration.

locations.name: Work 'n Surf
locations.description: Experience the ultimate lifestyle blend at Work 'n Surf.

personas.title: Remote Working Professionals
personas.description: Escape the office without missing a beat. Bring your A-game to the beach.

personas.title: Digital Nomads
personas.description: Stable fiber internet, backup power, and a community of doers wherever you land.

personas.title: Programmers / Developers / Indie Hackers
personas.description: Deep-focus zones, dual monitors, failover internet. Ship code, not excuses.

personas.title: Freelancers & Independent Consultants
personas.description: Client calls from paradise. Creative flow fueled by nature, not noise.

personas.title: Startup Founders / Startup Teams / Product Builders
personas.description: War rooms with ocean views. Retreats that actually produce results.

personas.title: Content Creators, Influencers, Vloggers, YouTubers, Podcasters
personas.description: Stunning backdrops, reliable uploads, and a creator-friendly atmosphere.

personas.title: Couples/Friends on 'work + vacation'
personas.description: Blend productivity with play—hack, plan, bond, then unwind together.

personas.title: Night Warriors
personas.description: Quiet-by-policy spaces with 24/7 power and internet for your graveyard shift.

personas.title: Students on 'study + vacation'
personas.description: Focus zones for cramming, nature breaks for recharging. Pass and play.

personas.title: Wellness-Oriented High Performers
personas.description: Balance peak output with mindful recovery in nature-rich environments.

personas.title: Weekend Work Warriors
personas.description: Turn your weekend into a sprint—arrive Friday, ship Monday, surf in between.

amenities.title: Redundant Fiber Internet
amenities.description: Dual-ISP failover connections ensure you never drop a call.

amenities.title: 24/7 Power Backup
amenities.description: Full-site generator support. Brownouts are just a story you tell.

amenities.title: Ergonomic Workstations
amenities.description: Spacious desks, comfortable seating, and external monitors.

amenities.title: Focus + Collab Zones
amenities.description: Sound-managed areas for deep work and dedicated collaboration spaces for teamwork.
